contents: Article 18 (Disqualifications for Executives) Any person who falls under any of the following items cannot become an executive of the Corporation. Revised 2014. 12. 29., 2015. 5. 26., 1. Persons falling under Article 33 (Disqualification) of the National Public Officials Act, 2. Article 17 (4), Article 37 (1), Public Institutions Management Act A person for whom 3 years have not passed since the date of dismissal pursuant to Article 35 (2) and (3), Article 36 (2) of the same Act, and Article 48 (4) and (8) of the same Act, 3. Deleted, 4. Deleted.
